BOOL CRPBitmap::LoadBitmap ( LPCTSTR  szFilename  ) 

Load bitmap from file.

Simplistic approach that may only work for particular types of bitmaps as outlined here http://www.codeguru.com/cpp/g-m/bitmap/article.php/c1707

For the MS recommended version see this page http://support.microsoft.com/kb/158898
